column1: # The non-standard rainfall sheet spans two decades.
# Values have been rounded to two decimal places.
# There is no detailed location information, the grid reference is central Malton.
# The readings originate from Thomas Short's 1750 'New Observations on Bills of Mortality', page 332.
# The rainfall sheet says 'Essex', but this is wrong - Malton in Yorkshire is the location - see page 356.
